author: daxian-dbw
body: Update-PowerShellActivitySource.ps1 is the script to generate activity source code for a given PS cmdlet. This script needs to be refactored to work in Github.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@mirichmo also found another script to port: 

```
admin\monad\src\cimSupport\cmdletization\xml\generate.ps1 and cmdlets-over-objects.xsd
```

It needs to be run when we change cdxml schema

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
The code generated by that tool isn't great - I did something similar for the types.ps1xml parser and ended up fixing it to be much faster and use much less memory.

Analyzing cdxml modules does show up as a hotspot, so I hope we find some time to fix this at some point. Also, given that we don't change the cdxml schema much, I think it's reasonable to manually change both on demand.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @daxian-dbw Seems we can close the Issue.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov Yeah! Workflow code is gone for good :)

title: Move admin\monad\src\Activities\Generated\Update-PowerShellActivitySource.ps1 to Github
